participant_1.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
I was a technical support engineer at a small startup before I got my current job.
i have a career in party planning.
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.

participant_2.background:
My constant tardiness causes problems for my friends and family.
some call me a hopeless romantic.
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
i have 5 children , though 2 have passed away.

content.text: I'm good, thanks for asking! I'm on my way to a meeting. What are you up to?
I'm just hanging out at home, getting ready for work. I have a huge party to plan for this weekend.
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of work! But also super fun. Are you excited?
I am! I love planning parties. It's like being a kid again, getting to play with all the decorations and food and music.
That's great! I'm more of a homebody, so I don't get to do things like that often.
Well, you're welcome to come to the party! It's going to be a blast.
You should! It'll be fun to meet you in person. I've heard so much about you.
Likewise! I've heard great things about you. You seem like a really fun person.
Aww, thanks! You're not so bad yourself.
